oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The burial vault of Samuel D. Morgan, located in the south entrance of the State Capitol Building, Nashville, Tennessee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The plaque reads, "Samuel D. Morgan. Died June 10, 1880. The state here gives repose to the remains of this eminent and useful citizen in recognition of the valuable services rendered by him in the building of the capitol."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: RG 82: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Monuments & memorials
